getByteRepresentation

public int[] getByteRepresentation(int majorVersion)
Description copied from interface: ID3v2_XFrameData
Turns the data into an array of bytes. Think serialization. The bytes are then able to be saved into a ID3 tag.

Specified by:
getByteRepresentation in interface ID3v2_XFrameData
Parameters:
majorVersion - the version number tag you would like to create
Returns:
the bytes representing the data.
